definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Only those sports which are practised on snow or ice are considered as winter sports.
sentences.chinese: 只有雪上和冰上项目才被认为是冬季体育运动。

sentences.english: Laser battle is fashionably military sport integrated with entertainment and training.
sentences.chinese: 雷战是一种集娱乐和培训于一身的时尚军事体育运动。

sentences.english: So how much exercise should the average person be getting?
sentences.chinese: 那对于一般人而言，到底要进行多少体育运动呢？

sentences.english: Sports and games are helpful for character-training.
sentences.chinese: 体育运动有助于品格培养。

sentences.english: Best of the sport is to do the deed, or shout nothing.
sentences.chinese: 体育运动的好处是只在乎行动而否则说空话。

sentences.english: The "Sunshine Sports"program is warmly welcomed in our school.
sentences.chinese: “阳光体育运动”项目是在我们学校的热烈欢迎。

sentences.english: The hobby each sports excel at the pingpong and the badminton .
sentences.chinese: 爱好各项体育运动擅长乒乓球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: Soccer (football) is one of the popular sports in Monaco.
sentences.chinese: 足球是摩纳哥最受欢迎的体育运动之一。

sentences.english: Dynamometer is a kind of appliance for sports and rehabilitation training.
sentences.chinese: 测力计是体育运动与康复训练的器具。

sentences.english: A back injury prevented active participation in any sports for a while.
sentences.chinese: 腰伤曾一度妨碍积极参加任何体育运动。

sentences.english: Bushcraft is a tradition as much as a sport.
sentences.chinese: 丛林技能既是体育运动也是一种传统。

sentences.english: But in March came big event number one, and it had nothing to do with sport.
sentences.chinese: 但是在三月份发生的头件大事却与体育运动无关。

sentences.english: She dwarfed all her rivals in athletic ability.
sentences.chinese: 她在体育运动方面的才能使她的对手相形见绌。

sentences.english: There'll be some sport reviews on TV.
sentences.chinese: 电视机上会有一些体育运动品题。

sentences.english: I used to play a lot of sport, but I seem to have lost interest mow.
sentences.chinese: 有一度我常进行体育运动，但现在好象没兴趣了。
